(0777) Read, write, and execute permissi: (0777) Read, write, and execute permissions for all users.
(0755) Read and execute permission for a: (0755) Read and execute permission for all users. The file's owner also has write permission.
(0750) Read and execute permission for t: (0750) Read and execute permission for the owner and group. The file's owner also has write permission.
(0700) Read, write, and execute permissi: (0700) Read, write, and execute permissions for the file's owner only.
(0666) Read and write permissions for al: (0666) Read and write permissions for all users. No execute permissions for others.
(0664) Read and write permissions for th: (0664) Read and write permissions for the owner and group. Read-only permission for all others.
(0660) Read and write permissions for th: (0660) Read and write permissions for the owner and group.
(0644) Read and write permissions for th: (0644) Read and write permissions for the owner. Read-only permission for all others.

(0600) Read and write permissions for th: (0600) Read and write permissions for the owner.

Fleets are an easy way to manage multipl: Fleets are an easy way to manage multiple devices that share the same configurations.<1></1>With fleets you will be able to edit and update devices in mass.
A resource sync is an automated Gitops w: A resource sync is an automated Gitops way to manage imported fleets. The resource sync monitors changes made to the source repository and update the fleet's configurations accordingly.
Fleets will appear in the fleets table l: Fleets will appear in the fleets table list and their status will be reflecting the resource sync process status. After a few minutes, they should be synced and enabled.
